positive_examples: This is an example of w m d countermeasure research facility.
The w m d countermeasure research facility demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed w m d countermeasure research facility in this context.
A typical case of w m d countermeasure research facility would involve these features.
The concept of w m d countermeasure research facility applies here.
A facility focused on developing defensive systems and countermeasures against weapons of mass destruction.
negative_examples: This is an example of nuclear weapon research facility, not w m d countermeasure research facility.
This represents w m d weapons research facility in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: NuclearWeaponResearchFacility, or other types of WMDWeaponsResearchFacility

definition: A facility researching defenses against weapons of mass destruction.
